title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.3: COORDINATION& MANAGEMENT HAS STRENGTEN AT NATIONAL AND SCHOOL LEVEL

description.narrative: The education system at national and school levels has strengthened capacities for coordination and management., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children and adolescents, including those in disadvantaged areas and/or affected by emergencies, are increasingly attending formal and non-formal education in an environment that promotes the acquisition of skills for their integration into social and economic life.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The education system at national and school levels has strengthened capacities for coordination and management.

description.narrative: Le renforcement de la coordination et de la gestion sectorielle ont été possible grâce à l'engagement des acteurs sectoriels et des communautés ainsi que du personnel enseignant | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020

title.narrative: Service Delivery - Schools with school development plans that explicitly address equity issues and that were developed with UNICEF support
System Strengthening - EMIS - EMIS that provides disaggregated data, including income/assets, disability and school physical environment - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Education sector planning - Education Sector Plan or Transitional Education Sector Plan developed with UNICEF support available
Existence d'un model de simulation financire et de lettre de politique ducative
Existence d'un rapport final de l'Evaluation du Schma Directeur de l'ducation 2010-2019
System Strengthening - Early learning - Early learning policy and early learning programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards - score (1-4), see guidance
